backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing user profiles, question management (with subjects and class levels), full syllabus mock tests with sections, test attempts with scoring, leaderboard functionality, and admin registration with access control using MixinAuthorization and MixinStorage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two features: automatic role refetch with success message and navigation after first admin registration, and visual indicator for admin registration status to prevent duplicate registrations.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and configuration, detailing routing, authentication, test interfaces, dashboards, and admin functionality with role-based access control.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for UI components including sidebar, charts, and semantic color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with meta tags for MHT-CET exam preparation platform, SEO keywords, and root div for React application mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring React Query client, TanStack Router with route tree, theme provider for dark/light modes, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying Concept Delta branding, quick navigation links, YouTube channel link, social media handle, copyright notice, and caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout wrapper component providing consistent structure with Navbar, main content outlet, and Footer across all application pages.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Navigation bar with Concept Delta branding, responsive mobile menu, Internet Identity authentication, dual admin verification using useGetCallerUserRole and useIsCallerAdmin hooks with comprehensive diagnostic logging, and conditional Admin Setup link visibility for non-admin authenticated users.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook managing backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, automatic query invalidation on identity changes, and admin token initialization from URL parameters.
Provides a mutation hook for registering admin users with retry logic, exponential backoff, and comprehensive error handling for actor connection issues and principal validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useChapterWiseTestMut: Exports mutation hooks for creating chapter-wise tests and assigning questions to them, with query invalidation on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useFullSyllabusTestMu: Provides mutation hooks for creating full syllabus tests and assigning section-based questions to them, invalidating relevant queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication with React context, providing login/logout functionality, identity management, and status tracking with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines query hooks for fetching full syllabus tests, chapter-wise tests, questions, user profiles, and user roles with enhanced logging and actor availability checks.
Provides a mutation hook for creating questions with pre-flight admin authorization checks, detailed error logging, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useTestSectionMutatio: Exports mutation hooks for starting and submitting test sections with answers, invalidating test attempt queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and responsive hero image styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminChapterWiseTestC: Admin page for creating chapter-wise tests with question selection, validation for test parameters (name, marks, duration), and assignment of selected questions to the newly created test.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard displaying analytics, test management (full syllabus and chapter-wise), question gallery, and user management with tabs and role-based access control.
frontend/src/pages/AdminFullSyllabusTest: Admin page for creating full syllabus tests with two sections (Physics/Chemistry and Maths), allowing selection and assignment of questions to each section with validation.
frontend/src/pages/AdminQuestionCreate.t: Admin form for creating questions with text/image support, four options with text/image, correct answer selection, explanation, subject, and class level fields with validation.
frontend/src/pages/AdminRegistration.tsx: Admin registration page accessible via direct URL that allows registering new admins by principal ID, with checks for existing admin status and role-based access control.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page component that displays hero banner, features, YouTube subscription prompt, and Telegram community link. Handles user authentication and navigation to dashboard or login based on Internet Identity status.
frontend/src/pages/Leaderboard.tsx: Displays top 10 test results in a leaderboard with medal icons for top 3 ranks, showing username, score, and time taken. Requires authentication and fetches leaderboard data for a specific test ID.
frontend/src/pages/ResultPage.tsx: Shows detailed test results including score, accuracy, time taken, and question-by-question breakdown with correct/incorrect indicators. Supports both full syllabus and chapter-wise tests, with PDF export functionality.
frontend/src/pages/StudentDashboard.tsx: Main dashboard for students displaying available full syllabus and chapter-wise mock tests organized by subject and class level. Handles test initiation by creating attempts and starting Section 1 before navigating to test interface.
frontend/src/pages/TestInterface.tsx: Interactive test-taking interface with timer, question navigation, answer selection via radio buttons, and section submission. Manages two-section test flow with transition screen and auto-submits when time expires.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: Defines application routing structure using TanStack Router with routes for landing, dashboards, admin pages, test interface, results, and leaderboard. All routes use a shared Layout component as the root.
frontend/src/utils/pdfExport.ts: Generates PDF reports for test results, calculating scores, statistics (correct/incorrect/unanswered), and formatting HTML content with test details, performance indicators, and question-by-question breakdowns for both full syllabus and chapter-wise tests.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for extracting URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support for maintaining state like admin tokens across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH color space (including sidebar, chart, and semantic colors), container settings, border radius variables, animations, and plugins for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata for 'Concept Delta' MHT-CET mock test platform, documenting architecture (Motoko backend, React frontend, Internet Identity auth), known issues with admin registration/authorization, and feature history including branding changes from 'COEPian Delta' to 'Concept Delta'.
